title: T212-3 beater lot (looking to trade for something else)
author: ZachS

posts.post_title: T212-3 beater lot (looking to trade for something else)
posts.post_content:
Group of 9 beater Obaks that I'm looking to trade for something that I can use. If you really need a better scan I can take them out of the page but let's be honest here... these are ugly.

Here's my want list:

1. T206 portraits
2. Louisiana issues
3. 53 Topps
4. 55 Topps
5. whatever
